summary: Makes frost atronachs roughly the size of the average Nord.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][b][center][color=#ff0000]I am aware that there is a mod that does the same thing, I didn't find it until a few days after I posted this mod. I will not remove this mod because this is a different size than the other one, and some may prefer this size over the other.[/color][/center][/b][/size]

Changes the scale of frost atronachs and makes them about the size of an adult Nord. Personally, I always found them annoyingly large. Not sure about the lore status in Skyrim's books and other games, but they were intended to be larger than most creatures in TESV, so it's not exactly lore friendly in this game. Use this all you want in your own mods, took me 2 minutes to make so I don't give a fudge. Just give credit and a link if you do. Same goes for posting this on other sites.
author: Sir Higglebottom
